title: fix: update gateway commit for Gemini executable_code blocks + reasoning_effort fix
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Updates the text gateway to correctly map Gemini's code execution blocks and fix reasoning visibility.
gist.impact: Developers using Gemini models now get standardized code execution results and more reliable thinking process outputs.
gist.visual_concept: Gemini model represented as a thoughtful robot or wizard, interacting with 'executable code' blocks. The Pollinations bee is there, perhaps reviewing the code or watching the 'thinking' process. Key elements: code blocks, thinking bubbles, glowing logic.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee watching a friendly robot wizard assembling glowing code blocks that form a path. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel violet gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel thought bubbles with logic symbols. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee watching a friendly robot wizard assembling glowing code blocks that form a path. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel violet gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel thought bubbles with logic symbols. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
